name: Memories of You (University Project 1st Year Student)
name_original: Memories of You (University Project 1st Year Student)
description:
A short visual-novel like experience. Only a short excerpt of a larger story.

“When I can’t take any more, my mind drifts away…

Down deep into a sea of memories…

My tears, indistinguishable…

I can only think of you.”

For legal reasons:

Music: https://www.purple-planet.com
